The **National Crime Research Centre (NCRC)**, a State Corporation under the Government of Kenya, is seeking to fill **21 vacant positions** as part of its strategic expansion. The Centre conducts research into crime and criminal justice and informs national policy through evidence-based findings.

### Open Positions

**1. Assistant Director Research – 3 Positions**\
**Grade:** NCRC 3 | **Ref No.:** NCRC/1/8/2025\
Lead and coordinate research on criminal trends and social phenomena. Supervise teams and produce policy briefs for national strategy.

**2. Assistant Director Finance – 1 Position**\
**Grade:** NCRC 3 | **Ref No.:** NCRC/2/8/2025\
Oversee budgeting, financial planning, audits, and compliance to support organizational sustainability.

**3. Assistant Director Human Resource – 1 Position**\
**Grade:** NCRC 3 | **Ref No.:** NCRC/3/8/2025\
Lead HR policy and operations, including staffing, performance, and employee engagement.

**4. Principal Planning Officer – 1 Position**\
**Grade:** NCRC 4 | **Ref No.:** NCRC/4/8/2025\
Guide strategic and annual planning, monitoring and evaluation, and proposal development.

**5. Senior Research Officer – 5 Positions**\
**Grade:** NCRC 5 | **Ref No.:** NCRC/5/8/2025\
Participate in study design, fieldwork, data analysis, report writing, and stakeholder engagement.

**6. Senior Officer Administrator – 1 Position**\
**Grade:** NCRC 5 | **Ref No.:** NCRC/6/8/2025\
Manage office logistics, travel, assets, and daily administrative functions.

**7. Senior Knowledge Management Officer – 1 Position**\
**Grade:** NCRC 5 | **Ref No.:** NCRC/7/8/2025\
Maintain institutional memory, digitize resources, and organize knowledge-sharing platforms.

**8. Human Resource Management Officer – 1 Position**\
**Grade:** NCRC 6 | **Ref No.:** NCRC/8/8/2025\
Support payroll, records, recruitment, and training administration.

**9. Supply Chain Management Officer – 1 Position**\
**Grade:** NCRC 6 | **Ref No.:** NCRC/9/8/2025\
Procure goods/services, manage stores, and ensure compliance with procurement laws.

**10. Accountant – 1 Position**\
**Grade:** NCRC 6 | **Ref No.:** NCRC/10/8/2025\
Manage accounting records, payments, reconciliations, and financial reporting.

**11. Legal Officer – 1 Position**\
**Grade:** NCRC 6 | **Ref No.:** NCRC/11/8/2025\
Provide legal counsel, draft contracts, ensure compliance, and support litigation matters.

**12. Internal Auditor – 1 Position**\
**Grade:** NCRC 6 | **Ref No.:** NCRC/12/8/2025\
Conduct internal audits, assess risks, and recommend control improvements.

**13. Corporate Communications Officer – 1 Position**\
**Grade:** NCRC 6 | **Ref No.:** NCRC/13/8/2025\
Manage communications strategy, media relations, website content, and reports.

**14. Records Management Officer – 1 Position**\
**Grade:** NCRC 6 | **Ref No.:** NCRC/14/8/2025\
Oversee proper records storage, digitization, and access control.

**15. Office Administrator – 1 Position**\
**Grade:** NCRC 6 | **Ref No.:** NCRC/15/8/2025\
Support clerical tasks, meeting coordination, correspondence, and supplies management.

### Application Procedure

Apply online via the [official NCRC website](http://www.crimeresearch.go.ke). Carefully follow the instructions on the careers portal.

**Deadline for applications:** Monday, 25th August 2025 at 5:00 PM\
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

> **Note:**\
> NCRC is an equal opportunity employer. Persons with disabilities, marginalized and minority groups are encouraged to apply. Canvassing will lead to automatic disqualification.
